titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any giant panda born in the United States should belong to the United States and the United States should seek the coordination of its allies to establish collaborative giant panda breeding programs.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any giant panda born in the United States should belong to the United States and the United States should seek the coordination of its allies to establish collaborative giant panda breeding programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that (1) any giant panda born in the United States should belong to the United States, and (2) the United States should seek the coordination of its allies to establish collaborative giant panda breeding programs.
